#summary How to get osgBullet

<wiki:toc />

= v1.0 Current Release =

Released 4 Nov 2009, v1.0 is the current stable release.

== Source ==

Source packages for v1.0 are available.

[http://osgbullet.googlecode.com/files/osgBullet_01_00_00.tar.gz osgBullet_01_00_00.tar.gz]

[http://osgbullet.googlecode.com/files/osgBullet_01_00_00.zip osgBullet_01_00_00.zip]

Use this URL to checkout a v1.0 source tree:

`https://osgbullet.googlecode.com/svn/tags/osgBullet_01_00_00`

== Binaries ==

Sorry, binary packages are not currently available.

= v1.1 Release Candidate =

== Source ==

[http://osgworks.googlecode.com/files/osgBullet_01_01_00_rc2.zip osgBullet_01_01_00_rc2.zip]

Use this URL to checkout a v1.1-rc2 source tree:

`https://osgbullet.googlecode.com/svn/tags/osgBullet_01_01_00-rc2`

Development for the v1.1 release is occurring on the 1.1 branch:

`https://osgbullet.googlecode.com/svn/branches/1_01-branch`

= svn trunk =

Checkout the latest osgBullet source code from svn:

`https://osgbullet.googlecode.com/svn/trunk`
